verbs.description: [ARGM-ADJ: rustic] [ARGM-TMP: summer] [ARG1: vegetable] [V: pasta] my veggie pasta proves you ca n’t have too much of a good thing feel free to change it up with whatever fresh veggies are in the garden or farmers market —bryn namavari chicago illinois vegetable

rustic summer vegetable pasta [ARG0: my veggie pasta] [V: proves] [ARG1: you ca n’t have too much of a good thing feel free to change it up with whatever fresh veggies are in the garden or farmers market —bryn namavari chicago illinois vegetable]
